caption.p: Leading patterns of summer SAT change between the 2000s and the 1980s in d4PDF. ( a– c) Regression patterns of SAT change between the 2000s and the 1980s against normalised scores for ( a) first, ( b) second, and ( c) third PCs. ( d– f) Variations in normalised scores among ensemble members. The 1980s and 2000s refer to 1981–1990 and 2001–2010, respectively.
